body_html:
The following code is NOT deterministic...

https://github.com/dlmacedo/deep-learning-class/blob/master/not_deterministic.py

I believe maybe it is not just a question of setting

cudnn.benchmark = False

and

cudnn.deterministic = True

body:
The following code is NOT deterministic...

https://github.com/dlmacedo/deep-learning-class/blob/master/not_deterministic.py

I believe maybe it is not just a question of setting 

> cudnn.benchmark = False

 and 

> cudnn.deterministic = True
